pageContext.claim: “Jon Tester voted in favor of deadly sanctuary cities.”
pageContext.analysis: This claim lacks context. A spokesman for the Montana senator says the senator opposes sanctuary cities and “thinks they are a symptom of our broken immigration system.” He opposed these bills because they did not include funding for local law enforcement and economic development, the spokesman said. Other red-state Democrats up for reelection supported the measure, which was blocked by a Democratic filibuster.
